an7.78:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti.
an7.78:1.7: anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ, dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
an7.78:1.8: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
an7.78:1.9: Āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an7.78:1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hotī”ti.
